item.title: Systematizing Knowledge
item.description: There should be a SNARK wiki. Any website that is better than someone saying “you know, check the June July 2014 bitcoin-wizard logs”. We need to research gmaxwell scalability. We should probably fix that. Let’s talk about what some of the goals are that we might get out of this. We have some different ideas for approaches to systematizing knowledge. There are at least three camps here. I think Bryan’s paper repositories.
